dynSentence.sentence: SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT MKMTBON.* FROM MKMTBON WHERE PRD_ID = ? AND MKT_ID = ? AND (HEMPTY('%s') OR USR_MBL_NO='%s') AND (HEMPTY('%s') OR USR_MAIL_ADDR='%s') AND ISS_DT=? AND BON_AMT=? AND BON_STS!='E' AND BON_STS!='H' ORDER BY CUR_AC_BAL DESC ) A LIMIT 0,1
